channel.title: 六月 on
channel.description: Recent content in 六月 on

item.title: 01 Getting Up - Jeff's
item.description: 01 Getting Up - Jeff’s GLOSSARY to get up – to get out of bed; to leave one’s bed This morning I got up very quickly because the baby was crying.

item.title: 01 Getting Up - Lucy's
item.description: GLOSSARY to get up – to get out of bed; to leave one’s bed He didn’t get up until 11:00 this morning, because he was up late last night reading in bed.

item.title: 02 Cleaning Up - Jeff's
item.description: STORY I go into my bathroom sometime around 6:45 a.m. My sink and medicine cabinet are on the left when you enter my bathroom.

item.title: 02 Cleaning Up - Lucy's
item.description: STORY I share a bathroom with my roommate, which is usually not a problem. We each try to keep the sink, the tub, and the toilet clean, and we have separate medicine cabinets to keep our things.

item.title: 0452 Dealing with Unhappy Employees
item.description: BODY 0452 Dealing with Unhappy Employees Asa: I don’t know how we got stuck with reviewing employee complaints.

item.title: 05 Taking Public Transportation to Work - Lucy's Day
item.description: Story I like my job but it takes over an hour to get there from my part of town. First, I walk three blocks to the subway station and swipe my monthly pass to get through the turnstile.

item.title: Taking Subway to Somewhere and buy a ticket remember
item.description: Misha: I’d like to buy a token for the subway. Clerk: The subway doesn’t use tokens anymore. ^5133b8 Misha: Oh? I didn’t know that.
